data.title: Olé Football Academy, Porirua, Wellington, New Zealand
data.meta_description: Olé are the benchmark for football development in New Zealand. They produce some of the most technically gifted footballers in the country.
data.text:
An environment devoted to developing the young, New Zealand footballer since 1997

They are the benchmark for football development in New Zealand. Few, if any, organisation or club can match them for long-term development of players. They produce some of the most technically gifted footballers in the New Zealand age-group ranks...

– Dominion Post/Stuff.co.nz

An environment devoted to player development since 1997

“They are the benchmark for football development in New Zealand. Few, if any, organisation or club can match them for long-term development of players. They produce some of the most technically gifted footballers in the New Zealand age-group ranks…”

– Dominion Post/Stuff.co.nz

About the Academy

Our reputation as New Zealand’s best academy is not because we had a grand vision – it’s just the result of being intensely committed to football education over a long period of time.

Visit the Academy page →

Pathways

Olé has a long history of providing pathways and placing players in environments in New Zealand and all around the world.

Visit the Pathways page →
